## ShortcutRegistry.register() method

Registers a keyboard shortcut.

**Signature:**

```typescript
register(shortcut: KeyboardShortcut, allowOverrides?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  shortcut | KeyboardShortcut | The shortcut for this key code. |
|  allowOverrides | boolean | _(Optional)_ True to prevent a warning when overriding an already registered item. |

**Returns:**

void

## Exceptions

{<!-- -->Error<!-- -->} if a shortcut with the same name already exists.
